alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:28AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kootenai County through 515 AM PDT... At 427 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dalton Gardens, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coeur d`Alene, Fernan Lake Village, Beauty Creek Campground, and Wolf Creek Campground. This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 14 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area
